column3: This code goes away with #11227, which is in the process of being PR'd in batches. I have no objection to improvements here, but I'd prefer to avoid making changes that will only cause conflicts with deleted code.

> This code goes away with #11227, which is in the process of being PR'd in batches. I have no objection to improvements here, but I'd prefer to avoid making changes that will only cause conflicts with deleted code.\n\nGood point, the review time is better spent elsewhere then.
Nit: ++it? (make no code difference probably, but I think it's good practice, and avoids later patches changing it around)
